title: Hidden structures: a driving factor to achieve low thermal conductivity and high thermoelectric performance
content:
Chem. Soc. Rev., 2024, 53,6100-6149
DOI: 10.1039/D4CS00038B, Review Article
Debattam Sarkar, Animesh Bhui, Ivy Maria, Moinak Dutta, Kanishka Biswas
This review highlights the implications of the local crystal structure for phonon dynamics and explores various strategies for enhancing thermoelectric performance in crystalline materials through local structure engineering.
